body:
Dear Mostapha Sadeghipour Roudsari,



I have found [this paper](http://www.ibpsa.org/proceedings/BS2013/p_2499.pdf) about ladybug. What about Butterfly? There is a paper to use eventually as a reference? 



Regards,

Francesco
topic: Butterfly: there is a research paper that can I eventually include as a reference?
